definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">scoreboard objectives add EnragedCoinTotal1Life dummy</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">scoreboard objectives modify EnragedCoinTotal1Life displayname "Most Enraged Coins in inventory."</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar EnragedCoinTotal1Life</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @a store result score @s EnragedCoinTotal1Life run clear @s allaboutengie:enraged_coin 0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
